```css
// Property: contactsAuthorization
// Description: Returns an authorization constant indicating if the application has access to the address book.
// Component(s): Ti.Contacts
'.contacts-authorization-authorized': { contactsAuthorization: Ti.Contacts.AUTHORIZATION_AUTHORIZED }
'.contacts-authorization-denied': { contactsAuthorization: Ti.Contacts.AUTHORIZATION_DENIED }
'.contacts-authorization-unknown': { contactsAuthorization: Ti.Contacts.AUTHORIZATION_UNKNOWN }
```
